channel.title: Cache issue
channel.description: so...when my auto cache downloader goes, it works and all...but the file it downloads from my dropbox it doesnt extract right, it extracts like 4 or 5 main classes then the rest is a .zip file still so i get the an error that it cant find the path...anyone got any reccomendations?
